revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Sector Action: "Eyes Go Above Surface" | class = SecActEyesSurface | doomednum = 9992 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SectorAction|SectorAction]]→SecActEyesSurface
This is a [[Transfer_Heights]]-specific thing that triggers its special when a player's viewpoint go above the fake floor of the sector it is in. See also: [[Thing executed specials]] ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SecActEyesSurface : {{Class|SectorAction}} native {}
